description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing UI state such as loading indicator and toasts in a React application.

methods.name: setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state in the UI store.

methods.name: addToast
methods.description: Adds a new toast notification to the store with a unique ID and timestamp.

methods.name: removeToast
methods.description: Removes a toast notification from the store by its ID.
